entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who asked if someone was attacked again and pulled Harry to his feet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who was attacked and has a scar on his forehead.

entities.name: avery
entities.description: Avery is in trouble because he gave Rookwood the wrong information.

entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is helping Avery and has told him that Bode couldn't have done it.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is a Death Eater who escaped from Azkaban and was with Rookwood.

entities.name: bode
entities.description: Bode couldn't have done it, according to Rookwood.

relationships.description: Rookwood is helping Avery because he gave him the wrong information.
You-Know-Who was with Rookwood, who is one of the Death Eaters who escaped from Azkaban.
Harry was You-Know-Who, a Death Eater who escaped from Azkaban.
